topic.title: Hospital Discharge Medications Section - conformance rules

section.p: The Hospital Discharge Medications section defines the medications that the patient is intended to take (or stop) after discharge. The currently active medications must be listed. The section may also include a patient's prescription history and indicate the source of the medication list, for example, from a pharmacy system versus from the patient.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10397 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11.1"
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15361)/@code="10183-2" HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15362)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:7827)
Conforms to Discharge Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35)
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15361)/@code="10183-2" HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15362)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7883)
Conforms to Discharge Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:7827)
Conforms to Discharge Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35)
